children.text: Build faster with Payload 3.0 & shadcn/ui

The ultimate Next.js + PayloadCMS starter kit featuring 50+ premium shadcn/ui components. Combine the power of headless CMS with the simplicity of a visual page builder. Gets you ready in minutes by using the amazing work of shadcnblocks.com.
Schneller bauen mit Payload 3.0 & shadcn/ui

Das ultimative Next.js + PayloadCMS Starter Kit mit 50+ Premium shadcn/ui Komponenten. Kombinieren Sie die Leistung eines Headless CMS mit der Einfachheit eines visuellen Page Builders. Macht Sie in wenigen Minuten bereit, indem Sie die erstaunliche Arbeit von shadcnblocks.com nutzen.
Ship Better Websites, Faster Than Ever

Stop wrestling with CMS integration and component libraries. Payblocks combines the best of modern web development—Next.js, PayloadCMS, and shadcn/ui—into a powerful starter kit that lets you focus on building, not configuring.
Visual Building
Build pages visually with drag-and-drop while maintaining full code control
Premium Components
50+ premium shadcn/ui components ready for production use
PayloadCMS Integration
Fully integrated headless CMS with live preview and TypeScript support
Developer Experience
Built for developers with clean code, full TypeScript support, and excellent DX
Questions ? Answers!
Payblocks comes as a complete package with everything you need to launch a professional website:
Complete Next.js 14+ starter with App Router and TypeScript configuration
PayloadCMS integration with visual page builder and live preview
50+ premium shadcn/ui components including:
Hero sections and landing page blocks
Pricing tables and feature grids
Blog and content templates
Navigation and footer variations
Forms and contact sections
You can customise many theme settings directly in payloadCMS.

faqs.question: Can I customize the design system without coding?

children.text: Yes! Payblocks comes with a built-in admin panel where you can customize colors, typography, spacing, and other design tokens without touching code. All components automatically update to reflect your changes while maintaining the professional polish of shadcn/ui.

faqs.question: Is PayloadCMS difficult to learn if I'm coming from other CMS platforms?

children.text: PayloadCMS is a modern, developer-first headless CMS that's fully integrated with Next.js. Unlike traditional CMS platforms, PayloadCMS offers several distinct advantages:
Built entirely in TypeScript with full type safety
Uses MongoDB for flexible content modeling
Provides a GraphQL API out of the box
Includes built-in authentication and access control
Offers real-time preview capabilities
Allows for direct integration with your Next.js application

The learning curve is gentle for developers familiar with Node.js and React, as PayloadCMS follows modern JavaScript patterns and practices. Its admin UI is intuitive and customizable, and the documentation is comprehensive and well-maintained. As a newer project, it benefits from modern architectural decisions and active community development.

faqs.question: How does Payblocks differ from shadcnblocks?

children.text: Payblocks includes a premium license to shadcnblocks, which gives you access to 300+ professionally designed components and blocks. While shadcnblocks provides the components themselves, Payblocks takes it further by:
Integrating these components with PayloadCMS for visual editing
Providing a complete starter kit with authentication, routing, and CMS setup
Offering visual customization tools for the components
Including pre-built page templates and layouts using shadcnblocks components
Delivering a fully configured development environment ready for production
Think of it as getting both the premium components and a complete development framework that makes them easily editable through a CMS.

faqs.question: Can I add custom components to the page builder?

children.text: Absolutely! While Payblocks comes with 50+ premium components, you can easily add your own. We provide clear documentation and TypeScript types for component registration, making it straightforward to extend the system with your custom elements.

title.en: Powerful Features To Make Web Development Simple | Payblocks

description.en: Discover how Payblocks helps you build websites faster. From visual page building to premium components - streamline your development workflow.

children.text: Theme Features
The Complete Package: Powerful Features That Make Website Development Simple and Fast
Visual Page Building

Watch your pages come to life as you build them. Our visual editor lets you drag and drop components right where you want them. See exactly how everything looks while you work. It's perfect for building pages quickly or showing designs to clients during meetings.
PayloadCMS Integration

PayloadCMS is closing the gap between CMS and Next. You get a clean admin interface that's easy to use, plus all the power of a proper headless CMS. Create custom fields, manage content types, and handle users without any extra setup. It's all ready to go.
50+ Ready-to-Use Components

We partnered with shadcnblocks.com to provide you a complete set of premium shadcn/ui components. Every component is production-ready and looks great out of the box. From hero sections to pricing tables, we've built everything you need for modern websites. No more rebuilding common elements from scratch.
Theme Customization

Change colors, typography, and spacing without touching code. Our visual theme editor makes it simple to match your brand. Every component updates automatically when you adjust the theme. It's like having a design system that configures itself.
Built for Real Development

Everything's set up the way developers expect. You get full TypeScript support, hot reload during development, and clean code that's easy to customize. The project structure is logical, documentation is thorough, and you can extend everything exactly how you need.
Lightning Fast by Default

Your site will be fast without extra work. We've configured Next.js for optimal performance, set up proper image optimization, automatic cache invalidation, and ensured components load efficiently. Get excellent Core Web Vitals scores and snappy page loads right from the start.
Don't waste time
Start your next project with payblocks now and create stunning websites!
